revision.text:
{{Spoiler}} [[File:XC3 Machine Assassin Weapon Icon.png|thumb|The Machine Assassin class icon]] {{quote|An Attacker who hounds foes with debuffs, then fells them at their most vulnerable with dual axes.|Class menu description}} '''Machine Assassin''' is a [[Keves]]i [[Attacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] in {{XC3}}. == Overview == Machine Assassin is the class of [[Segiri]]. Machine Assassins use [[Blade (XC3)|Blades]] known as Doom Axes. It specializes in inflicting many debuffs to weaken the enemy, before going in for the kill. It can be unlocked by completing the [[Hero Quest]] ''[[Inhumanity]]''. The [[Class Rank (XC3)|Class Rank]] maximum is increased to 20 by completing the Ascension Quest ''[[Invisible Bond]]''. {{clr}} ==Class Aptitude and Unlock Requirements== {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:100%; valign:center;" !Party Member |[[File:Icon chara battle n0ah.png|60px]]
'''[[Noah]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 1.png|60px]]
'''[[Mio]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 2.png|60px]]
'''[[Eunie]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 3.png|60px]]
'''[[Taion]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 4.png|60px]]
'''[[Lanz]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 5.png|60px]]
'''[[Sena]]''' |- !Aptitude |[[File:XC3 Aptitude A Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude C Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude D Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude S Icon.png|35px]] |- !Class Unlock Points Required |2,965 |5,925 |4,940 |3,950 |6,915 |''Class Inheritor'' |} == Class Rank Requirements == {| class="xc1 centered" width="45%" ! Rank ! CP needed ! Nopon Coin Cost |- | 1 | colspan="2" | None |- | 2 | 265 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 3 | 265 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 4 | 330 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 5 | 330 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 6 | 400 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 7 | 400 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 8 | 430 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 9 | 430 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 10 | 465 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | colspan="3" class="event" | Complete ''[[Invisible Bond]]'' |- | 11 | 395 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 12 | 395 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 13 | 520 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 14 | 520 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 15 | 645 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 16 | 645 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 17 | 780 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 18 | 780 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 19 | 845 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 20 | 970 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |} {{clr}} == Class Stats == The Machine Assassin class grants the following multipliers to a character's base stats (see their individual pages for their base stats), and sets their Physical and Ether Defense to the following values, depending on their current Rank. Intermediate values are linearly interpolated between the minimum and maximum values, rounding to the nearest percent. {| class="xc1 centered" width="100%" ! Rank !! HP !! Attack !! Healing Power !! Dexterity !! Agility !! Physical Defense !! Ether Defense |- | 1 || 75% || 115% || 20% || 110% || 70% || 15% || 5% |- | 10 || 77% || 120% || 22% || 115% || 72% || 17% || 7% |- | 20 || 80% || 125% || 25% || 120% || 75% || 20% || 10% |} === Weapon Stats === The character's Attack stat after being modified by the above class stats is further modified by adding the class's weapon stat, which depends on the character's [[Level (XC3)|Level]], to obtain the final base Attack stat. These weapon stats also determine the character's Critical Rate and Block Rate. Characters temporarily assume these weapon stats to calculate relevant statistics when using a Master Art from this Class without it being part of a Fusion Art. If a Master Art is used in a Fusion Art, the weapon stats corresponding to the character's current Class will be used instead for calculations. {| class="xc1 centered" width="60%" ! Level !! Attack !! Critical Rate !! Block Rate |- | 1 || 20 || 20% || 10% |- | 10 || 45 || 21% || 11% |- | 20 || 81 || 22% || 12% |- | 30 || 126 || 23% || 13% |- | 40 || 175 || 24% || 14% |- | 50 || 234 || 25% || 15% |- | 60 || 299 || 26% || 16% |- | 70 || 370 || 27% || 17% |- | 80 || 452 || 28% || 18% |- | 90 || 543 || 29% || 19% |- | 99 || 635 || 30% || 20% |} == Arts == * '''[[Viral Vector]]''' ([[Battle Arts (XC3)#Talent Arts|Talent Art]]), AOE/2 random debuffs * [[Tyrant Cross]], 1 random debuff (Rank 1 Master Art) * [[Fatal Bite]], Side attack ↑ (Rank 10 Master Art) * [[Terror Onslaught]], Back resistance down * [[Havoc Slayer]], AOE / Spread debuffs * [[Mega Crescent]], Extend debuff time === Hero-Exclusive Arts === * [[Fury Reaper]], AOE / Spread debuffs * [[Seventh Edge (XC3)|Seventh Edge]], Back resistance down * [[Hundred Shells (XC3)|Hundred Shells]], Extend debuff time == Class Skills == * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 10.png]] '''Cursed Edge''': Boosts damage dealt by 50-70% when attacking a debuffed enemy. (Rank 5 Master Skill) * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 10.png]] '''Chaos Chain''': Debuffing an enemy boosts damage dealt by 20-30% (up to a maximum of 150%). * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 43.png]] '''Anti-Erosion System''': Grants 30-50% resistance to all debuffs. (Rank 15 Master Skill) * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 5.png]] '''Phantom Strike''': Adds 60-100% chance for attack to be unblockable. === Stat Increases=== {| class="xc1 centered" style="width:80%;" ! Class Rank ! Chaos Chain ! Phantom Strike ! Cursed Edge ! Anti-Erosion System |- | 1 | 20% | 60% | 50% | 30% |- | 5 | 22% | 70% | 55% | 35% |- | 10 | 25% | 80% | 60% | 40% |- | 15 | 27% | 90% | 65% | 45% |- | 20 | 30% | 100% | 70% | 50% |} == Notes == * Not all debuffs can be inflicted with this class. To see a full list of all applicable debuffs, see ''[[Status Effect]]''. {{clr}} == Trivia == * The clothing a character wears while using the Machine Assassin class is dependent on their gender. Male characters wear an outfit designed after a Ferron Unit, while female characters wear [[Segiri]]'s outfit. == Gallery == Segiri Hero Artwork.png|Segiri, a Machine Assassin Machine Assassin Noah.png|Noah as a Machine Assassin Machine Assassin Mio.png|Mio as a Machine Assassin Machine Assassin Eunie.png|Eunie as a Machine Assassin Machine Assassin Taion.png|Taion as a Machine Assassin Machine Assassin Lanz.png|Lanz as a Machine Assassin Machine Assassin Sena.png|Sena as a Machine Assassin {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Classes]]

{{spoiler}} {{Infobox Character |name = Manana |image = XC3 Manana portrait Artwork.png |description = Manana |gender = Female |age = Unknown |species = [[Nopon]] |haircolor = Pink |eyecolor = Yellow |affiliation = [[Colony Gamma]] (formerly) |voiceactorjp = [[wikipedia:Aya_Suzaki|Aya Suzaki]] |voiceactoreng = [[wikipedia:Grace Saif|Grace Saif]] |appearances = {{XC3}}
{{XC3FR|sublink}} (flashback) }} '''Manana''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|マナナ}}, '''Manana''') is a character in {{XC3}}. == Overview == Manana & [[Riku]] are unlocked as a [[Hero]] duo after completing the [[Hero Quest]] ''[[A Nopon's Counsel]]''. She and [[Riku]] together are also known as Peerless [[Riku & Manana]] (Japanese: {{Lang|jp|技巧のリク&マナナ}}, ''Kigō no Riku & Manana''). She is a chef from the [[Agnus|Agnian]] colony of [[Colony Gamma]].[https://topics.nintendo.co.jp/article/3ced4c9d-a5e1-43a3-b16e-0005971ed404 Nintendo] Although she is initially a noncombatant, she later chooses to fight together with Riku as a single unit. == Gameplay == {{main|Riku & Manana}} At [[Rest Spot (XC3)|Rest Spots]], Manana can [[Manana's Menu|cook]] food for the party, her food grants the party temporary buffs. == Plushes == [[Monolith Soft]] made handmade plushes of Riku & Manana. They have weapons, and ''"they look so cool and kawaii!"'' https://twitter.com/XenobladeJP/status/1552915657691242496 == Trivia == * Riku & Manana, [[Nia]], and [[Melia]] are the only non-DLC Heroes in {{XC3|-}} that can never be fought by the party. == Gallery == === Artwork === XC3 Riku and Manana Artwork.png|Official Artwork of Riku and Manana Riku Manana XC3 EX Artwork.png|{{XC3|-}} Expansion Pass Artwork of Riku and Manana XC3 Riku & Manana as Yamsmiths.jpg|Riku & Manana as Yumsmiths Riku and Manana Concept Art.png|Manana's Concept Art MS recruiting Artwork Reina Nakamura.jpg|Monolith Soft recruiting artwork XC3 OST Artwork.jpg|Xenoblade 3 Original Soundtrack Artwork === In-Game Renders === Manana Hero Icon.png|Manana's Hero List Icon Riku Manana Hero Icon.png|Riku and Manana's Hero List Icon Riku & Manana Chain Art Icon.png|Riku and Manana's Chain Order Icon Riku Manana Level Up Art.png|Riku and Manana's Level Up Art Icon chara 7.png Icon chara battle 7.png XC3 Manana Icon.png|Manana's unused Affinity Chart Icon === Screenshots === RikuManana.jpg|Riku with Manana XC3 Manana Screenshot 1.jpg XC3 Manana Screenshot 2.jpg XC3 Manana's Cooking 01.jpg XC3 Manana's Cooking 02.jpg === Merchandise === XC3 Riku & Manana plushes 02.jpg XC3 Riku & Manana plushes 03.jpg XC3 Riku & Manana plushes 04.jpg == Videos == File:マナナ|Manana == References == {{xc3 stub}} {{XC3CharNav}} [[Category:Manana]] [[Category:XC3 Heroes]] [[Category:XC3 Nopon]] [[Category:Agnus]] [[Category:Pages needing plot info]]
